content.title: Uses
content.description: Ornamental- flowers bell shaped with large yellow petals. Extracts of the plant's roots have in vitro antimicrobial activity. Extract from leaves contains flavonoids kaempferol 3-O-rhamnoside, quercitrin, and myricitrin as well as methyl gallate. Analgesic activity is found due to the flavonoid quercitrin as well as its antispasmodic effects. It also has antioxidant property.
